entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:09AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels on Interior Rivers... Temperatures warming into the 70`s through next week will result in increased snowmelt runoff from higher elevations. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 29 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS
